content.rendered:
Country Bank is proud to support Financial Literacy through our fun and educational programs designed for students of all ages. It’s just one reason why we’re called the best bank in Massachusetts.

Parents can learn great tips on teaching their children the importance of saving money, and teachers can request Financial Literacy lessons for the classroom on money related topics. Many of these lessons can be taught by Jodie Gerulaitis, our Financial Education Officer here at Country Bank, and our dedicated Financial Education Department.
